definition: Tahiti, island of the Society Islands group in French Polynesia
to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid

sentences.english: The only serious stress is laid upon the degradation of tahiti .
sentences.chinese: 唯一严肃的地方是把塔希提岛奚落了一番。

sentences.english: Papeete, on the island of Tahiti, is the capital. Population, ', 753.
sentences.chinese: 位于塔希提岛的帕皮提是其首都。

sentences.english: Tahitians are very respectful and generous and kind.
sentences.chinese: 塔希提人是非常讲礼貌，慷慨而和善的。

sentences.english: Papeete, on the island of Tahiti, is the capital. Population, 166,753.
sentences.chinese: 位于塔希提岛的帕皮提是其首都。

sentences.english: "Do you want to come to tahiti with me?"That would be spiffy. "
sentences.chinese: 你想和我一起去塔希提岛吗？“那可真不赖。

sentences.english: Right, how could she manage to find a plane flying back to Tahiti?
sentences.chinese: 她怎样才能找到一架飞回塔希提岛的飞机呢？

sentences.english: Tahiti lies in the South Pacific.
sentences.chinese: 塔希提岛位于南太平洋。

sentences.english: Tahiti is also famous for its pearls.
sentences.chinese: 塔希提同样以它的珍珠而闻名。

sentences.english: D. Later waves of settlers arrived by the 12th century, this time from Tahiti.
sentences.chinese: 此后，从12世纪开始，大批人从塔希提岛来此定居。
